Question: Shenzhen Jingyue Times Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Junjie Times Technology Co., Ltd.

Electric Scooter

- Various models available (ES-001 to ES-012)
- Range of electric scooters for different needs

Mountain E-Bike

- Multiple models offered (EB-001 to EB-036)
- Designed for mountain biking enthusiasts

Urban E-Bike

- Several models available (EB-006, EB-007, EB-008, EB-009, EB-010, EB-011, EB-012, EB-013, EB-014, EB-015, EB-016, EB-021-1)
- Tailored for urban commuting

Electric Motorcycle

- Diverse range of models (EM-001 to EM-012)
- Suitable for various riding preferences

Accessories

- Range of accessories such as beverage bottle holders, phone holders, touchscreen front beam bags, helmets, lights, adapters, maintenance tools, rearview mirrors, and elbow pads & knee-pads
- Designed to complement electric bikes and scooters

Location

- Based in Shenzhen, China
- Focuses on research, development, and manufacturing of electric bikes and scooters
Summary_cn:
深圳君杰时代科技有限公司。

电动滑板车

- 有多种型号可供选择（ES-001至ES-012）
- 提供适应不同需求的电动滑板车

山地电动自行车

- 提供多种型号（EB-001至EB-036）
- 专为山地骑行爱好者设计

城市电动自行车

- 提供多个型号（EB-006、EB-007、EB-008、EB-009、EB-010、EB-011、EB-012、EB-013、EB-014、EB-015、EB-016、EB-021-1）
- 专为城市通勤设计

电动摩托车

- 有多样的型号可选（EM-001至EM-012）
- 适合各种骑行喜好

配件

- 提供各种配件，如饮料瓶架、手机支架、触摸屏前大灯袋、头盔、灯具、适配器、维修工具、后视镜以及肘部和膝盖护具
- 设计用于补充电动自行车和滑板车

地点

- 基于中国深圳
- 专注于电动自行车和滑板车的研发和制造
